Sentencas: A dynamic simulation model of a hybrid power generation system of a solid oxide fuel cell and a homogeneous charge compression ignition engine was developed to investigate the behavior of the system during the start-up process.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: The stack, reformer, catalytic burner, and heat exchanger were implemented as dynamic models based on physical equations.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: For the engine, an experimental data-based mapping model was developed.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: The dynamic model was simulated on a Matlab/Simulink platform.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Individually developed component models were assembled as an integrated system model and operated at the system level.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: The hybrid system was designed to generate approximately 4 kW of electricity from the SOFC stack and 1 kW from the engine, resulting in a total system power of 5 kW, with an electrical efficiency of 50.6%.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: The integrated model was operated using a four-step start-up procedure for 50 h, during which the temperature and composition of the stream were observed in time.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Based on this, the dynamic behavior of the system was analyzed at each stage throughout the entire start-up process from ambient to high operating temperature.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Validation of key results suggests a close resemblance between the model and an actual system.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Therefore, the proposed model is expected to exceed the limitations of the existing static model analysis method.
Titulo: Analysis of start-up behavior based on the dynamic simulation of an SOFC-engine hybrid system
